bad: Upstream: Could not find version on github

about.summary: A small library for fetching information from deltarpm packages

name: drpm
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "drpm" %}
{% set version = "0.5.0" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/rpm-software-management/drpm/archive/{{ version }}/drpm-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: d54460e84af36481b66585d4496f687687470e2f90ec94dad7972d620e053448

build:
  number: 0
  skip: true  # [win or osx]
  run_exports:
    - {{ pin_subpackage('drpm', max_pin='x') }}
  ignore_run_exports:
    - cmocka


requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}
    - make
    - cmake
    - pkg-config
  host:
    - bzip2
    - openssl
    - rpm-tools
    - xz
    - zlib
    - zstd
    - cmocka
  run:
    # https://abi-laboratory.pro/index.php?view=timeline&l=rpm
    - {{ pin_compatible('rpm-tools', max_pin="x.x") }}

test:
  commands:
    - test -f $PREFIX/lib/libdrpm$SHLIB_EXT

about:
  home: https://github.com/rpm-software-management/drpm/
  license: BDS-3-Clause AND LGPL-2.0-or-later
  license_file:
    - LICENSE.BSD
    - COPYING
  summary: 'A small library for fetching information from deltarpm packages'
  dev_url: https://github.com/rpm-software-management/drpm/

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - chrisburr
